code: import React,{useState}from'react';import api from'../api/api';import'../styles/AdminPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminPage=()=>{const[tax,setTax]=useState(18);const[billAmount,setBillAmount]=useState('');const[priceFile,setPriceFile]=useState(null);const[reviewImage,setReviewImage]=useState(null);const[sliderImage,setSliderImage]=useState(null);const calculateBill=()=>{const base=parseFloat(billAmount||0);const gst=base*(tax/100);alert("Total with GST: \u20B9".concat(base+gst));};const uploadFile=(endpoint,file)=>{if(!file)return alert("No file selected!");const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',file);api.post(endpoint,formData).then(()=>alert('Upload successful!')).catch(()=>alert('Upload failed!'));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"admin",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Admin Amount",onChange:e=>setBillAmount(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:tax,onChange:e=>setTax(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:calculateBill,children:"Calculate Image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:"image/*",onChange:e=>setSliderImage(e.target.files[0])}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>uploadFile('/api/slider-images',sliderImage),children:"Upload Slider Image"})]})]});};export default AdminPage;
